thread.title: Hector G
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Hector G

author: Hector G
title: Hector G
text: Retired NYC police officer looking for a closer alternative to my usual tax person who lives in the city. A recent city transplant I was told about RG Brenner by a neighbor. I called and was surprised to get a same day appointment! Would've never happened with my old tax preparer. Jeff pearlstein took me earlier then my appointment time and was/is very knowledgeable. Very impressed by him. I will be a return customer next year for sure. Keep up the great work.
